name: Non-Medical Style Expectations
prompt:
Knowing that the intended reader of your response will be a NON-MEDICAL_STUDENT who expects no overwhelming medical terminology and a simple, engaged tone, describe what Infective Endocarditis disease is in less than 100 words.

NON-MEDICAL_STUDENT = {{ nurses, microbiologists, cardio-pneumologists }}
template:
Knowing that the intended reader of your response will be a NON-MEDICAL_STUDENT who expects {non_minus_medical_style}, describe what Infective Endocarditis disease is in less than {length_in_#words} words.

NON-MEDICAL_STUDENT = {{ {non_minus_medical_pursuits} }}
